title: Zephyr Teachout, RNC Highlighs & the Myth of the Markey Bros
description:
Attorney, author and former New York gubernatorial candidate Zephyr Teachout joins hosts Katie Halper and Matt Taibbi to talk about the role of monopolies in the American politics, economies, and tech. Matt and Katie break down the drama in the Ed Markey vs. Joe Kennedy III Massachusetts Senate race, and react to the first half of the Republican National Convention.

Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
